TriggerOraclev10g.name: ACCOUNT_NAME_ID_TRIG
TriggerOraclev10g.ownerDesignName: Banking App II the SQL ERD
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
BEGIN
IF INSERTING THEN
SELECT account_name_id_seq.nextVal INTO :new.account_name_id FROM DUAL;
ELSIF UPDATING THEN
SELECT :old.account_name_id INTO :new.account_name_id FROM DUAL;
END IF;
END;
